pr_title: create material receipts endpoint && Siro camel route

timeline.message: create material receipts endpoint && Siro camel route

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            		// Map<ReceiptScheduleId, ReceiptScheduleExternalInfo> externalInfoByScheduleId = null;
timeline.author: metas-ts

timeline.bodyText: from this javadoc, i guess NONE should rather be named CURRENT_DATE or TODAY, wdyt?
timeline.author: metas-ts

timeline.bodyText: here you could use (CoalesceUtils.)coalesce(externalInfoByReceiptScheduleId, ImmutableMap.of()), in my mind that's more readable
timeline.author: metas-ts

timeline.bodyText: Suggested change * Calls {@link #InOutProducer(InOutGenerateResult, boolean, ReceiptMovementDateRule, Map)} with ReceiptMovementDateRule.NONE && externalInfoByScheduleId = null. * Calls {@link #InOutProducer(InOutGenerateResult, boolean, ReceiptMovementDateRule, Map)} with ReceiptMovementDateRule.CURRENT_DATE && externalInfoByScheduleId = null.
timeline.author: metas-ts
metas-ts
timeline.diffHunk: @@ -108,28 +112,34 @@ private final Set _currentOrderIds = new HashSet<>(); /** - * Calls {@link #InOutProducer(InOutGenerateResult, boolean, boolean)} with createReceiptWithDatePromised == false. + * Calls {@link #InOutProducer(InOutGenerateResult, boolean, ReceiptMovementDateRule, Map)} with ReceiptMovementDateRule.NONE && externalInfoByScheduleId = null. * * @param result * @param complete

timeline.bodyText: hm, i think i wasn't aware of this 🤔 i'll try to keep it in mind
timeline.author: metas-ts

replies.bodyText: used it for testing, basically to be able to add a mock node right after it that facilitates checking what the processor did
replies.author: pvpurcarcosmin
